mapper.update: update order set usr_id = #{usrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, usr_address = #{usrAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usr_cellphone = #{usrCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detection_point = #{detectionPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_remark = #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distance = #{distance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, result_data = #{resultData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, construction_process_photo = #{constructionProcessPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select order_id, usr_id, usr_address, usr_cellphone, detection_point, coupon_id, order_remark, distance, order_date, result_data, area, construction_process_photo from order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select order_id, usr_id, usr_address, usr_cellphone, detection_point, coupon_id, order_remark, distance, order_date, result_data, area, construction_process_photo from order
